mapper.update: update qna set title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, contents = #{contents} where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select N.*, F.fnum, F.fname, F.oname from (select *, lag(num,1) over(order by num) prev, lag(title,1) over(order by num) prevT, lead(num,1) over(order by num) next, lead(title,1) over(order by num) nextT from qna) N left outer join qnaFiles F on N.num = F.num where N.num = #{num}
select count(ref) from qna where num > 0
